Package hexanome.fourteen.server.model.board

Class GameBoardHelper

java.lang.Object
hexanome.fourteen.server.model.board.GameBoardHelper
public final class GameBoardHelper extends Object
Game board helper, containing static helper methods.

    • canAffordPayment

      public static org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> canAffordPayment(Gems requiredGems, Gems paymentWithoutGold, int goldGemsUsed, int goldGemsMultiplier)
      Determine whether a player's payment is enough to afford paying for this resource.
      Parameters:
      requiredGems - The required gems, the resource's cost
      paymentWithoutGold - The player's payment excluding gold gems
      goldGemsUsed - The number of gold gems used, these act like wild tokens
      goldGemsMultiplier - The amount of gems each gold gem is worth.
      Returns:
      The response containing the error message if there was an error, null otherwise.

    • isCardFaceUpOnBoard

      Parameters:
      decks - the decks of cards
      card - the card to check for
      Returns:
      true if the card is face up on the board, false otherwise
